Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides a cost-of-living adjustment for members of retirement systems
Summary: Provides a cost-of-living adjustment for members of retirement systems by increasing the base benefit amount for computation to $21,000.
LawCode: Amd §§78-a & 378-a, R & SS L; amd §532-a, Ed L; amd §13-696, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, the education law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing cost-of-living adjustments
